column3: Traffic;Kep:------ There was an incident on February 10
column5: at the intersection of National Road No. 13-35 located in Chamkar Chek village
column9: involving a truck-trailer and a train.------The truck with Kampot license plate 3A-1252 was driven from south to north by a male named Kokina
column13: Kampot province. A Cat excavator was knocked into a ditch.------No injuries were reported in the accident
column14: and the train continued on to Sihanoukville.
